      • createAudioStream

        public static AudioInputStream createAudioStream(AudioFormat format,
                                                 byte[] data)
        Create an AudioInputStream from an AudioFormat and the audio data.
        Parameters:
        format - Expected to be PCM.

      • createAudioStream

        public static AudioInputStream createAudioStream(AudioFormat format,
                                                 ByteArrayInputStream data)

      • createAudioStream

        public static AudioInputStream createAudioStream(InputStream stream)
                                          throws UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                                                 IOException
        Create a AudioInputStream from a InputStream. This is to work around a bug in AudioSystem which may return AudioInputStream with a wrong AudioInputStream.getFrameLength().
        Throws:
        UnsupportedAudioFileException
        IOException

      • getDuration

        public static Duration getDuration(AudioInputStream stream)
        Get the duration of a PCM encoded audio stream.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if format is not PCM encoded with specified frame rate.

      • getDuration

        public static Duration getDuration(AudioFormat format,
                                   int bytes)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if format is not PCM encoded with specified frame rate and frame size.

      • getLengthInFrames

        public static long getLengthInFrames(PCMAudioFormat format,
                                     Duration duration)
        Returns:
        the number of frames needed to contain the given duration of audio.

      • concat

        public static AudioInputStream concat(Iterable<AudioInputStream> streams)
        Concatenate a sequence of AudioInputStream into a single AudioInputStream.
        Parameters:
        streams - Must be streams with the same (PCM) audio format.

      • split

        public static Iterable<AudioInputStream> split(AudioInputStream stream,
                                               Duration... splitPoints)
        Split a AudioInputStream into a sequence of AudioInputStream.
        Parameters:
        stream - Must be PCM encoded. AudioInputStream.getFrameLength() must return the actual number of available frames in the stream.
        splitPoints - Are relative to the beginning of the stream.
        Returns:
        A sequence of streams. The number of streams is one more than the number of split points. The durations are approximately (apart from rounding errors due to sampling) the time between the split points.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a negative split point is provided, a split point exceeds the total length of the input stream, or a split point is not greater than or equal to the preceding split point ,and also if the audio format is not PCM encoded with specified frame rate and frame size.

      • split

        public static Iterable<AudioInputStream> split(AudioInputStream stream,
                                               long... splitPoints)

      • createSilence

        public static AudioInputStream createSilence(PCMAudioFormat format,
                                             Duration duration)
        Parameters:
        duration - must not be negative
        Returns:
        null if duration is too short

      • createSilence

        public static AudioInputStream createSilence(AudioFormat format,
                                             long frames)
        Parameters:
        format - must be PCM encoded
        frames - must not be negative
        Returns:
        null if frames is 0

      • convertAudioStream

        public static AudioInputStream convertAudioStream(AudioFormat newFormat,
                                                  AudioInputStream stream)
        Convert audio from one format to another.

      • isPCM

        public static boolean isPCM(AudioFormat format)
